title: Bug 6410: File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: Bug 6410File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
OB: When using code assist, the file is getting dirtied even though there are no suggestions.
EB: If code assist has nothing to suggest, it should not dirty the file.
SR:
1. Open a file.
2. Trigger code assist by typing a relevant keyword.
3. Verify that if there are no suggestions, the file does not get dirtied.
